鞹字的基本解释

鞹
kuò
古同“鞟”：“乃使吏鞹其拳。”

鞹字的汉语字典释义

[①]［kuò］
［《廣韻》苦郭切，入鐸，溪。］
亦作“鞟1”。
(1)去毛的皮；皮革。
(2)比喻事物残存部分。
(3)制革。
(4)以皮革包裹。
(5)靴子。
(6)通“彀”。张满弓弩。

鞹字的康熙字典解释

【戌集中】【革字部】　鞹； 康熙笔画：20； 页码：页1391第10
〔古文〕?【唐韻】【正韻】苦郭切【集韻】【韻會】闊鑊切，?音廓。【說文】去毛皮也。【論語】虎豹之鞹。　又【詩·齊風】載驅薄薄，簟茀朱鞹。【傳】諸侯之路車，有朱革之質，而羽飾之也。【釋文】苦郭反。革也。　【集韻】又作鞟。

考證：〔【詩·齊風】載驅薄薄，簟笰朱鞹。〕　謹照原文笰改茀。
鞹字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
鞹字的起名意思

暂无。

鞟
Basic explanation of words
鞟
kuò
Gu Tong's "Yun": "Is the officer's fist."
鞟
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [kuò]
["Guangyun" bitter Guo cuts, enters the duo, streams. ]
Also known as "Ying 1".
(1) Dehaired skin; leather.
(2) It is a metaphor for the remaining parts of things.
(3) Tanning.
(4) Wrapped in leather.
(5) Boots.
(6) Through "彀". Full of crossbows.
鞟
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
【戌集】【The Department of Leather Characters】　鞟; Kangxi Strokes: 20; Page Number: Page 1391 No. 10
[Ancient text]? [Tang Yun] [Zheng Yun] Kuguo cut [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] wide wok cut, sound outline. [Said the text] Go to fur. [The Analects] Tiger and Leopard's Wing.　[Poetry·Qi Feng] Zai Bo is thin, 猀茀朱鞟. [Biography] The car on the road of the lords has the quality of Zhuge, and it is also decorated with feathers. [Explanation] Kuo Guo Fan. Leather also.　【Jiyun】reappears as Yun. Textual research: [[Poetry·Qi Feng] Zai Bo Bo, 簟笰 Zhu Yun. 〕　I would like to change the original text.
鞟
